title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations         A Commercial Use Authorization is required in most cases for anyone doing business within the park. This includes anyone wishing to provide commercial activities such as temporary food vending, guided horse rides, fishing trips, guided backpacking, etc. Some activities may be managed under a Concessions Contract.  More detailed information, cick here. Link to permit application.      A Special Use Permit is required for special activities that take place in the park such as weddings, scattering of cremains, First Amendment activities, commercial photography, and other activities.  More detailed information, click here. Link to Permit Application       If you have questions contact the Concessions Program Office at 573-323-4864 or by e-mail.
